fullplot: Years after the assassination of President George W. Bush in Chicago, an investigative documentary examines that as-yet-unsolved crime.
plot: Years after the assassination of President George W. Bush in Chicago, an investigative documentary examines that as-yet-unsolved crime.
title: Death of a President

tomatoes.consensus: In this unconvincing fictional documentary, the tense 30 minutes that lead into the title event is outweighed by the boring, melodramatic hour preceding it.
